items.style rules: @media screen { #_id_ > .puiresp { display:grid; grid-template-rows:2rem 65px 1fr 55px; grid-template-columns:0px 1fr 2rem; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(1) { grid-column-end:span 2; background-color:rgb(51, 130, 196); } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(2) { grid-row-start:2; grid-column-start:1; grid-column-end:auto; grid-row-end:span 1; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(3) { grid-row-start:2; grid-column-start:2; grid-column-end:span 2; grid-row-end:span 1; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(4) { grid-row-start:1; grid-column-start:3; grid-column-end:span 1; grid-row-end:span 1; background-color:rgb(51, 130, 196); } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(5) { grid-row-start:3; grid-column-start:1; grid-column-end:span 3; grid-row-end:auto; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(6) { grid-row-start:4; grid-column-start:1; grid-column-end:span 3; grid-row-end:auto; } } @media screen and (min-width: 481px) { #_id_ > .puiresp { grid-template-columns:0px 2fr 1fr 65px; grid-template-rows:65px 1fr 55px; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(1) { grid-column-end:span 1; grid-row-start:1; grid-column-start:3; grid-row-end:auto; background-color:rgb(255, 255, 255); } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(2) { grid-row-start:1; grid-column-start:1; grid-column-end:auto; grid-row-end:span 1; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(3) { grid-column-end:span 1; grid-row-start:1; grid-column-start:2; grid-row-end:span 1; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(4) { grid-row-start:1; grid-column-start:4; grid-column-end:span 1; grid-row-end:span 1; background-color:rgb(255, 255, 255); } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(5) { grid-row-start:2; grid-column-start:1; grid-column-end:span 4; grid-row-end:auto; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(6) { grid-column-end:span 4; grid-row-start:3; grid-column-start:1; grid-row-end:auto; overflow-y:auto; } } @media screen and (max-width: 480px) { #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(3) { grid-column-start:2; grid-column-end:span 2; grid-row-start:2; grid-row-end:span 1; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(5) { overflow-y:scroll; } }

items.placeholder: How was this session? Leave feedback here.
